SELECT
LOYALTY_ID , SALES_ORD_ID , SALES_ORD_NO , HP_CODE , CUST_ID , CUST_NAME, TEL_M, TEL_R, TEL_O, EMAIL, INST_ADD_LINE1, INST_ADD_LINE2, INST_AREA, INST_POSTCODE, INST_CITY, INST_STATE,
TOT_OUTST , TOT_ORDER_IN_USE , WP_IN_USE , WP_TOT_OUTST , AP_IN_USE , AP_TOT_OUTST , MATTRESS_IN_USE , MATTRESS_TOT_OUTST , POE_IN_USE , POE_TOT_OUTST , SOFTENER_IN_USE , SOFTENER_TOT_OUTST , BIDET_IN_USE , BIDET_TOT_OUTST ,
HP_CALL_REASON_CODE, HP_CALL_REMARK, STUS , REMARK, CRT_USER_ID, UPD_USER_ID
FROM SAL0271D
WHERE HP_CODE = #{regId} ORDER BY CUST_NAME

SELECT
A.LOYALTY_ID, B.STK_DESC, B.STK_CTGRY_ID, '1' as UNIT, B.OUTST, B.USAGE_MTH
FROM SAL0271D A JOIN SAL0284D B ON A.LOYALTY_ID = B.LOYALTY_ID
WHERE A.HP_CODE = #{regId} and B.STK_CTGRY_ID = '54' ORDER BY A.CUST_NAME
